original_title: A Christmas Story Documentary: Road Trip For Ralphie
overview: During an adventure spanning two years and two countries, two mega-fans of "A Christmas Story" set out to discover all the film's shooting locations. Along the way they uncover forgotten facts, discover little-known locations and recover long-lost movie memorabilia.
tagline: The perfect companion to a treasured holiday classic.
title: A Christmas Story Documentary: Road Trip For Ralphie
